name: Professional Power Drill
description: High-performance professional power drill perfect for construction and renovation projects. Features variable speed control, LED light, and extended battery life. Includes chuck key and carrying case.

name: Excavator - Mini
description: Compact mini excavator ideal for small to medium construction projects, landscaping, and utility work. Easy to operate with excellent maneuverability in tight spaces. Operator training available.

name: Generator - Industrial
description: Reliable industrial generator providing clean, stable power for events, construction sites, and emergency backup. Quiet operation with automatic voltage regulation and fuel gauge.
